name: fozz(pre-demo)
description:
the (pre-demo)game about cute lil' fox that murders innocent chickens

contains two levels and... that's it! but they're hard I guess...

and yes, that's not even a demo, but I decided to post it anyway so my friends and maybe even YOU could play it and give me ideas/criticism

demo will contain my own soundtrack, boss and another cool things

Enjoy!
